Name: Pulseball
About the game: With the easy to learn controls, anyone can learn how to play right away. The game is simple, run around in first-person and shoot the ball with your pulse gun to move it and score goals. Both the ball and your gun have realistic physics which allows you to bank shots off the walls, the ceiling, or even other players to help you win. Pulseball currently has 2 different maps, and single-player training as well as a few multiplayer modes. Recently Added: -New game mode! -Minimal VR Support -GUN CLASSES!
